skills.name: MANGLE
desc: • Deals one hit of physical damage and one hit of true damage to a single target.
• Heal a random ally based on your ATK.
• Deal Additional Physical and True Damage if your HP is 60% or below.

skills.name: OMEN
desc: • Grant Immunity and Cleanse to all allies for 1 turn.
• Inflict Permadeath on all enemies for 1 turn.

skills.name: LIFE AFTER DEATH
desc: Instantly Revive Self with 60% HP upon death.
